output:
Ain't got no light when my baby's gone
When I met her in the shaggy bar The light were turning round
She wore a black diamond dress And her eyes were gray like moonshine
Oh I was so shy and so unsure The sweat was pouring on my mouth
I tried to cover things I couldn't find And I danced with my baby all night long
But I can't help it Baby, baby, baby, baby, baby
I'm all alone, I'm all alone Please, please come home
The night after I went back again My sweet little girl was full of light
The whole party wear sunglasses To watch her body dance like charm
I saw her in the mirror and I saw her eyes She was crazy, I stopped the time
My poor baby, my poor baby, my poor baby Was just a dead man's child
Oh I was so shy and so unsure The sweat were pouring on my mouth
Such a little girl, cruel by the face Of the love she deserved
I will give it to her, I will give it to her And she will say
Please, please, please, please my lord Please help me, please my lord, please help me
Help me for her
Baby, baby, baby, baby, baby I'm all alone, I'm all alone
Please, please, please, please my lord Please help me, please my lord, please help me
Please, please, come home
